Ward–Discard your hand.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if four or more permanent cards are in your graveyard, you draw a card and you lose 1 life. Then if eight or more permanent cards are in your graveyard and Old Night Falling isn't a creature, it becomes an 8/8 Horror Avatar creature and gains trample and menace. [i](This doesn't end at end of turn.)[/i]
